itunes:title: JUL 21, 2022 - RIOT JUSTICE: DAVID DORN MURDERER CONVICTED
title: JUL 21, 2022 - RIOT JUSTICE: DAVID DORN MURDERER CONVICTED
description:
JUSTICE IS SERVED! A jury convicted the criminal who murdered retired St. Louis Police Captain David Dorn during the 2020 riots. DHS Alejandro Mayorkas claimed the border “is secure”; however, footage from Tapachula, Mexico captured DURING POSO’S WAR ROOM BROADCAST shows otherwise as a new caravan wave of thousands of migrants run down the National Guard. The Fed eyes criminal charges for Hunter Biden after he lied to the ATF about the abuse of hard narcotics. The Twitter-Musk trial over the $44 billion deal is set for October in the state of Delaware. 



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


To get $150 off each 3-month supply of ‘My Patriot Supply’ go to PrepareWithPOSO.com and use promo code POSO
